sentences.en: A tumultuous welcome from a 2,000 strong crowd greeted the champion.
sentences.cn: 多达2,000名群众热烈欢迎冠军。

sentences.en: All that makes up the tumultuous torrent rushing with terrific force towards the only sea.
sentences.cn: 这一切造成了奔腾的一股激流,具着排山之势,向着惟一的海流去.

sentences.en: Do you - - does each of you -- accept this great trust [ Tumultuous assent ]?
sentences.cn: 请问大家 -- 请问各位 -- 是否接受这个 重托 呢(台下纷纷答应 )?

sentences.en: His predecessor was accorded an equally tumultuous welcome.
sentences.cn: 他的前任受到了同样热烈的欢迎。

sentences.en: It has boisterous go - go bars, clamorous discos and tumultuous nightclubs.
sentences.cn: 那儿有喧闹的现代酒吧 、 迪斯科舞厅及过夜酒馆.

sentences.en: It's been a tumultuous day at the international trade negotiations in Brussels.
sentences.cn: 那是布鲁塞尔国际贸易谈判中纷乱的一天。

sentences.en: Later the Kennedys visited France and the welcome tumultuous.
sentences.cn: 接着肯尼迪夫妇访问了法国,欢迎的场面有些混乱.

sentences.en: Mr Mandela was given a tumultuous reception in Washington.
sentences.cn: 曼德拉先生在华盛顿受到热情的款待。

sentences.en: She left the stage to tumultuous applause.
sentences.cn: 她在一片热烈的掌声中离开了舞台.

sentences.en: Such tumultuous, often visually spectacular, interstellar regions surrounding youthful stars are known as gaseous nebulae.
sentences.cn: 这种环绕着年轻星的动荡且常常是壮观的星际区域,叫做气体星云.

sentences.en: the tumultuous years of the Civil War
The victorious team were given a tumultuous welcome when they arrived home.
sentences.cn: 凯旋的队受到热烈的欢迎.

sentences.en: The whole tumultuous rush has passed.
Then came a ringing and knocking at the front door, that grew at last tumultuous.
sentences.cn: 后来有人在前门按铃,敲门, 最后乱敲乱打起来.

sentences.en: Today can offer you a bit of respite tumultuous few weeks.
sentences.cn: 繁忙的几周以后你终于能够得到一点喘息的机会.

sentences.en: Tumultuous applause followed but received an unexpected check.
sentences.cn: 掌声轰然四起,但随即又出人意料地刹住了.

trans.tran_cn: 骚乱的，吵闹的，狂暴的，激烈的
trans.tran_en: very loud because people are happy and excited
